reviews.text: We stayed for a week at the end of a superb tour of Sri Lanka and although the wind was strong and we couldn't swim in the sea, we relaxed totally during our time at the Amanwella. Although the food was a bit limited sometimes, the overall atmosphere and the villas were perfect.
reviews.title: A brilliant time

reviews.text: We stayed at the Amanwella for 3 nights in mid October. I have never been to a better beach location than this. The view is magnificant, empty beaches, palmtrees etc.
reviews.title: Great Location, but Vila not perfect

reviews.text: The local people in the hotel are extremly friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Personalised Care and Impeccable Service

reviews.text: The Villas are very nice, but spend the extra money for seaview, its worth it.
reviews.title: Fantastic resort!

reviews.text: Was origanally scheduled to stay for 3 night be we liked it so much that we added two more days.
reviews.title: Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is just marvelous. The beach is picture perfect and there is also a fishing village next to the resort where the local villagers come ashore with their catch. They were very friendly and treated us to freshly caught sea-food barbequed on the beach.
reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous

likes.liked: — The service from the staff and management

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was upgraded to a sea-view villa. The villa was perfect, have absolutely no complaints about it.
reviews.title: Be part of the Amanwella Family – its wonderful!!

likes.liked: — Janet, Raymond and their team made the difference - like being with friends
likes.disliked: — You are based on the resort - not the best to wander out of the resort.

reviews.text: The local staff was excellent and very friendly.

This place is perfet for relaxing, but it is not the place for people looking for entertainment. The hotel was very empty when we were there, very few guests. Not sure if that is always the case, but it it did not seem like a place to meet fellow travellers.
